name: Create Front contacts from Google Forms responses and add them to groups
description: Every time a new Google Forms response is submitted, Make will automatically use the email output from that response to look the person up using Clearbit. If it returns a result it will add that person as a contact to Front and add them to a group. This example uses the responses in [this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1KytET6Ql0u9ogzaERz24YrLQEusOn7Iwa8dN6B0dFNY/edit#gid=964126193).
